meanings.definition: To surpass in serving or providing service.
meanings.sent1: The new restaurant outserves all the others in town.
meanings.sent2: She always outserves her coworkers by going above and beyond.
meanings.sent3: The helpful robot outserves the clumsy waiter at the diner.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness outserves any material gift she could give.
meanings.sent5: The superhero outserves all expectations with their incredible acts of service.

meanings.definition: To be more helpful or beneficial than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: In times of need, friendship outserves any material possession.
meanings.sent2: His advice always outserves any self-help book on the market.
meanings.sent3: The loyal dog outserves any other pet by always being by your side.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude outserves any negative thoughts that try to bring her down.
meanings.sent5: The sun outserves any artificial light by brightening up the whole room.
